description.value: Your eyes become especially sensitive to relatively slight fluctuations in temperature. You can see through non-magical fog, mist, and clouds without penalty, ignoring any @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.Kjba2E3Ad5oMJ7hV.JournalEntryPage.1jkwbVTGQihSpCrL]{cover} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.Kjba2E3Ad5oMJ7hV.JournalEntryPage.nyB6pt2dd6iVQGmS]{concealment} bonuses those effects would provide to other creatures. In addition, if you have @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#darkvision]{darkvision}, the range of your darkvision is doubled.
